text: There really isn't a lot here except that you can take service 123 and sentosa bus A, B and C. At least it's not as empty as Tampines Concourse Interchange
Excellent bus service and we can enjoy the beach till late evening there is bus service till 11:30pm .. drivers are very friendly and buses run on time as detailed in schedule
The bus team is terrible, always not on time. nobody knows when the team will come. Terrible.

It seems that the bus is operated by the driver. The time is just right, relying on the timetable is ridiculous. Since it is an island with no traffic jams, no one will know even if the driver decides to take a rest here and there. It's not managed.
